<H3>Protypes wish list</H3>

Below is a running list of top innovations we should be considering for our next release. 
We want to focus on a list of items that require mock up work so that we can schedule time with Owen to work on the requirements.  Chris will use this list to discussion our priorities in the Product Team Meetings.

<ol>
<li> QuickFilter
<li> QuickAdd for Calendar
<li> WikiIntegration
<li> Calendar scroll to next/prev week month (ala Google Maps)
<li> Calendar with Advanced Time Zones
<li> 
</ol>
